Articles.Content:
If you're going to do anything make a new thread and alliance.

I can't pass command to anybody.
We can keep this thread since it doesn't say the alliance name.So updates will be posted.Also I may just build a new one if were going to change things up.
I would probably apply for Wiki when I found a new alliance. By then I would probably have another thread. Until then we'll post updates here.

I don't see why Monk panicked so badly. Those who stayed in the alliance are doing fine. If he hadn't deleted his nation I would say it was okay to reinvite everyone. Now all that is left to decide is who gets control over the alliance as it is now.
yah It probably saves the mods a lot of time if we kept bloc related things on this thread.

Update: FLAP has recognized our alliance as independent ,and well other stuff I just forgot.Also we now have to listen to Comintern. This however will not interfere with anything with the african legion.

Edit:I was thinking of creating a new alliance called the MUC (Mainsail Union Conglomerate) or KUSRP (Kerbal Union of Space Research Pact) ,any ideas on a better name?

edit 2:Yah this means were need to converge ,and think up a new alliance ,and some rules on what to do.

Edited September 13, 2013 by MGUARN
Can the nation of cat join?
well you in ,but not really since the allaince doesn't have a leader yet ,but anyone got a name for a new one? I think the Mainsail Union Conglomerate is good one.
I do as well. Shall we start it off?

Okay streamline your invited to M.U.C since the name was to big.

Edit:Also post your name here if you want to join.

Edited September 16, 2013 by MGUARN
Hey could i join again? Ny name is Imgur.
It has happened! nukes are in!! (hides in a fallout shelter)
You are now invited Imgur ,and yes nukes we must be prepared to do this.
Nukes have always been in but they added uranium just now

Invit me please

United stars

Invites sent also there rule that we all must follow so that we can have a better chance of not going to war. the link to the rules to our alliance is here: http://www.bloc.name/forum/index.php/topic,2695.0.html (also a bit lazy to copy the rules then paste it here )
can ijoin the new aliance, i left the old one during the war
Okay whats the name?I forgot ,or i couldn't find my list from the old alliance. Nvm found the list.
Wait, wait NUKES!? Well, lets prep for some wars...

Back well the nukes can only e made if your nation has urainum which you can't mine yet only certain amount of random nations have them ,and from what i heard it sounds like the big alliances have lots of nukes.
Damn, we should be able to build fallout shelters and bomb shelters...
well at least there some people that have sense not to launch nuclear attacks if they want to hurt there growth of there continent.
Yeah, I am a really small country after 3 different wars. D:
well one thing we should focus on is building military power ,and economic power.So that means we need to go on oil buying sprees ,and improve quality of life to at least above average.

Due to recent events while i was gone during the weekend ...the mongols have been attacked by Surimu-Ka one of our one ,and gassed with out any permission to do so.I will say the one rule you need to follow if do not want to kicked: Ask me before you gas ,and attack.You can gas without permission if your being attacked ,but you need to refund there country if you gass the even if you asked just to be a good sport.So yeah with that Surimu-Ka will not receive any sort of aid from us for any wars he gets into (mainly if you go to war twice you don't get aid.)So you are on your own for about two wars you might get into.(Also said this on the bloc forums so yah no help for a while.)
